senses.sense_definition: A crystalline chemical compound used as a mild antiseptic for skin conditions and in the manufacture of dyes, resins, and adhesives.

examples.text: The dermatologist recommended a lotion containing <w>resorcinol</w> to help clear up the patient's acne.
Because it is waterproof and durable, <w>resorcinol</w> glue is frequently used in boat building.
